comments.comment: For one: Chimpanzee's do not just attack or flip out, but according to one of the photo's where the woman is laughing, showing her teeth (it is seen in the video at: 1:48. Now this could be for the picture only, but fact is, if you laugh like that at any primate or animal it means trouble. The instinct of a Chimpanzee is that when it sees another being showing its teeth, he thinks that being wants to fight.  That's why Gorilla's or chimps show their teeth and not to smile as some think
